duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively share knowledge and provide a positive customer experience, addressing customer inquiries through various mediums.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Stay current with product information and participate in relevant industry courses/seminars for skill improvement.
Meet or exceed performance measurement goals and suggest innovative process changes that support business practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent with additional training, Four-year college degree preferred
